header_text: You are enjoying a meal with your family at a restaurant. You choke on a bite that is too big and begin to cough very loudly. A few people turn to look over at your table, and you feel embarrassed.

elements.Text: After getting some fresh air and talking it over, were you able to see things from a different perspective?

elements.name: You are enjoying a meal with your family at a restaurant. You choke on a bite that is too big and begin to cough very loudly. A few people turn to look over at your table, and you feel embarrassed. _Family & Home Life_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
